definition: A feeling of deep sorrow, grief, or distress, often associated with personal suffering or pain. It is commonly used to describe emotional or physical suffering, anguish, or hardship.

examples.english: She has experienced a lot of suffering.

examples.german: Das Leid der Welt berührt mich.
examples.english: The suffering of the world touches me.

examples.german: Er hat sein Leid in Alkohol ertränkt.
examples.english: He drowned his sorrows in alcohol.
